text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/bfdr/CodeSystem/CodeSystem-local-bfdr-codes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
unknownplannedhomebirth Unknown if Planned Home BirthUnknown if Planned Home Birth
assistedventfollowingdelivery Assisted ventilation required immediately following deliveryAssisted ventilation required immediately following delivery
assistedventmorethan6hrs Assisted ventilation required for more than six hoursAssisted ventilation required for more than six hours
FCOD_maternalconditions Maternal Conditions/Diseases (Specify)Maternal Conditions/Diseases (Specify)
FCOD_membranes Complications of Placenta, Cord, or Membranes: Other (Specify)Complications of Placenta, Cord, or Membranes: Other (Specify)
FCOD_obstetricalcomplications Other Obstetrical or Pregnancy Complications (Specify)Other Obstetrical or Pregnancy Complications (Specify)
FCOD_fetalconditions Other Fetal Conditions/Disorder (Specify)Other Fetal Conditions/Disorder (Specify)
rel_fatherofbaby Father of babyFather of baby
rel_hospitalemployee Hospital employeeHospital employee
rel_other Other (with write in text)Other (with write in text)
rel_otherrelative Other relativeOther relative
loc_birth Birth Location
loc_transfer-from Transfer-from Location
loc_transfer-to Transfer-to Location

name: LocalBFDRCodesCS
title: Local BFDR Codes
description: Local Codes for concepts in BFDR that lack an appropriate LOINC or SCT code

concept.display: Assisted ventilation required immediately following delivery
concept.definition: Assisted ventilation required immediately following delivery

concept.definition: Assisted ventilation required for more than six hours

concept.definition: Complications of Placenta, Cord, or Membranes: Other (Specify)
